sentence.Network_en: His slogans come from the world of nationalism not the world of technocracy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的口号来自民族主义的世界,而不是来自技术的世界.

sentence.Network_en: West Technocracy, an important social thought, claims that experts should govern society totally.
sentence.Network_cn: 专家治国论是西方一种重要的社会思潮, 它主张技术专家全面管理社会.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from Greek tekhnē 'art, craft' + -cracy

entry.tran: 技术专家统治群体;技术专家政治集团
entry.def: A technocracy is a group of scientists, engineers, and other experts who have political power as well as technical knowledge.

example.tran: 布鲁塞尔技术专家政治集团的权力

entry.tran: 技术专家政府;技术官僚政治
entry.def: A technocracy is a country or society that is controlled by scientists, engineers, and other experts.

example.tran: 技术专家统治的中央集权政府

means.word_mean: 1. a form of government in which scientists and technical experts are in control
